text: I would like to keep a couple of fields in sync between HubDB and a Notion database table. I checked Zapier but they donâ€™t see to support any HubDB based triggers. I would prefer to avoid having to code something custom. Any suggestions?
So the core issue is that hubdb doesn't support webhooks so any solution that you build or use out of the box will need to use polling
hightouch only supports it as a destination .. which is fine .. I just want to ensure I have a single source of truth .. don't care which side owns the data
oh yeah then that would be perfect
